column2: try the 72 hour sous vide wagyu. You might be tempted to spring for something more traditional
column3: but this beef is the best you could  ask for. It's topped with just the right amount of wasabi
column4: and the rice underneath it is perfectly cooked to make the whole bite just melt in your mouth. Each piece isn't  cheap
column5: but it's a dish you'll remember and want again for a long time to come. For me
column6: that beef is guaranteed to bring me back to Uchi whenever I get the chance.
